text: Hi, I forgot my password. Can you help me reset it?
Of course! Do you remember your username and email address associated with the account?
Yes, my username is JohnDoe and my email is johndoe@example.com.
Great! To reset your password, I'll need to send you a verification code. Please confirm if you want me to proceed.
An email has been sent to you with a verification code. Please provide me the verification code to change your password.
I received the verification code. It's 970420.
Thanks! To set your new password, please provide me with a new one.
Your password has been successfully updated.
